          <title>
            <string language="hu">Andrea della Robbia: Szentháromság oltár, 15. század eleje, Székesegyház, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, majolika.</string>
            <string language="en">Andrea della Robbia: Altar of the Holy Trinity, the beginning of the 15th century, cathedral, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andrea della Robbia: Altar der heiligen

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Della Robbia d'Andrea : Autel de la

370x260 centimètre, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Della Robbia de Andrea: Altar do trinity

            <string language="x-mt-el">Della Robbia της Andrea: Βωμός της ιερής
